SELECT tt.* FROM ( SELECT gz.gp_name, gz.id, gz.turnover, gz.gp_code, gz.number / 10000 AS number, DATE_FORMAT( gz.created_date, '%y-%m-%d' ) AS date, gz.current_price FROM gp_zx gz WHERE gz.id IN ( SELECT max( gz.id ) FROM gp_zx gz WHERE gz.gp_code = #{gpCode} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( gz.created_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) AND DATE_SUB( CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY ) <= date( gz.created_date ) ) tt WHERE
tt.percent >=0
tt.percent <=0
ORDER BY tt.percent DESC

SELECT gz.id, gz.turnover, gz.gp_code, gz.number as number, DATE_FORMAT(gz.created_date,'%y-%m-%d' ) as date, gz.current_price FROM gp_zx gz WHERE gz.id IN ( SELECT max( gz.id ) FROM gp_zx gz WHERE gz.gp_code = #{gpCode})

SELECT sum( volume ) as turnover, price as current_price FROM gp_xl_percent where symbol=#{gpCode} and create_time >CURRENT_DATE
GROUP BY price order by turnover desc,current_price desc

SELECT sum( turnover ) AS turnover, avg( tt.current_price ) AS current_price FROM ( SELECT sum( volume ) AS turnover, price AS current_price FROM gp_xl_percent where symbol=#{gpCode} and create_time >CURRENT_DATE GROUP BY price ) tt WHERE tt.current_price < #{currentPrice} UNION ALL SELECT turnover, tt.current_price FROM ( SELECT sum( volume ) AS turnover, price AS current_price FROM gp_xl_percent where symbol=#{gpCode} and create_time >CURRENT_DATE GROUP BY price ) tt WHERE tt.current_price = #{currentPrice} UNION ALL SELECT turnover, tt.current_price FROM ( SELECT sum( volume ) AS turnover, price AS current_price FROM gp_xl_percent where symbol=#{gpCode} and create_time >CURRENT_DATE GROUP BY price ) tt WHERE tt.current_price > #{currentPrice} order by current_price desc
